attributes.action: agree that the 2007 Pay Award for Health Servces Employees is infact a significant pay cut, and that He WILL ensure that a revisiting of the pay award takes place and increases this award to above the cost of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nurses Pay Award 2007, has infact deducted upto 650BPS from the average pay packet of nurses in the UK's NHS. This has pushed Nurses closer than ever before towards Strike Action, This petition is aimed to make the Prime Minister increase the pay award and avoid the significant damage a general NHS Strike could cause
